Free Live Transcript

A free transcript of everything you say

Free Live Transcript allows you to generate a transcript for anything you say. Instantly access your transcript on all your devices.

Access Free Live Transcript Anywhere

Whether you're on the go, or at your computer, you can access all your transcripts in a few simple clicks.

Supercharge your events

We've got the tools to boost your productivity.

Transcript

Ensure sensitive information never makes its way into Free Live Transcript by excluding certain information with our live editor.

Plain text transcripts

Remove unwanted formatting from transcribed text for a consistent look.

Live preview

View of all your transcripts in real time as Free Live Transcipts produces them on the spot.

Free Live Transcripts for iOS and Android

Available for free on the app store. Download for Mac or iOS, sync with icloud and you're ready to start adding to your clipboard.
